name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
本課程以當代文學批評和文化理論為基礎，探討小說與戲劇改編成電影的過程中，文字轉化成視覺意象之間的差異，期能提升多元化的思辯及表達能力。
Film and Literature
In this course, students will write, shoot, act in, and edit their own film.  In preparation for such a project, we will discuss the basics of film theory and editing, emphasizing the special nature of film – what makes it distinct from other art forms – as a unique combination of image, word, and sound.
schedule:
Week 1  Intro
		Production assignments

Week 2  Basics of Film Theory 1:  Image, Word, and Sound
		
Week 3:  Basics of Film Theory 2:  Using the Camera

Week 4:  Script review and production meeting (locations, set design, costumes)

Weeks 5-12  Shooting schedule

Weeks 13-17   Editing
